page.title: 06The Ghost of Port Lympne
page.content: Port Lympne has a Gift Shop in the Octagonal Library where visitors may buy souvenirs. The custodian talked to me in this room which she said was positioned directly above the site of the Temple of Mithras that the Romans abandoned after the Roman occupation, and told me about the ghost. Whilst making the foundations for a new road on the Wild Life Park, workmen found the skeleton of a Roman soldier, still wearing remnants of leather and bronze, only a stones throw from the site of the Temple. Sometimes books are swept from the shelves, flower pots disturbed and flowers, arranged and left in a vase overnight have been removed and laid out in a fan-shaped pattern on the floor. The ghost is regarded with affection by some, but not by all.
